sentence.Network_en: A Stoic person responds to hardship with imperturbation.
sentence.Network_cn: 坚忍克己之人经受苦难仍能泰然自若.

PerfectNetExp.abs: impertinently 不礼貌地, imperturbation 泰然自若, imperturbable 沉着冷静

list.abs: 沉着的英文翻译... ... 沉着应对 deal with something calmly 沉着镇定 be calm and imperturbable 沉着勇敢 be steady and brave.

after inside upheaval , it is important to fix on imperturbable things . their imperturbableness . their air that nothing has happened renews our guarantee .在经历了内心动荡之后，专心于一些让人冷静的事物尤其重要，这些事物不温不火，仿佛什么事也没有发生过的样子重新恢复了我们的安全感。
Nobody can imperturbable acceptance of the inevitable ., 没有人能够泰然的接受不可避免的事.

list.exp: 虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若
list.abs: Hitherto imperturbable , he now showed signs of alarm ., 虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若 , 但他现在表现出一些惊慌.
